body:
$SPY When I think about Ackman I think about the Wall St game & how he gets to play it. 
A $400m loss on $nflx, an almost $4b loss in Valeant & yet he still gets to run a HF & people still give him money. 
 
Amazing isn't it? 
 
https://www.yahoo.com/news/3-lessons-from-bill-ackmans-4b-trading-loss-in-valeant-182037105.html 
 
$baba $aapl $bb

links.title: 3 lessons from Bill Ackman's $4B trading loss in Valeant
links.description: As you probably know, Bill Ackman is the founder and CEO of the hedge fund, Pershing Square Capital Management. Last week, he gained a lot of press coverage for one particularly bad investment in Valeant Pharmaceuticals (VRX). Mr. Ackman liquidated his entire position in Valeant at a loss exceeding $4 billion!
